cause.description:
Stop cutting children. Routine infant circumcision violates the basic human right to an intact body- no one has the right to hold you down and cut you without your consent!
1. basic human rights disallow the forceful cutting of children
2. there is no medical justification for routine circumcision
3. religious freedom is a personal right; it does not extend to the body of another
cause.name: Students for Genital Integrity
